metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48011 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: GPAC v2.3-DEV-rev566-g50c2ab06f-master was discovered to contain a heap-use-after-free via the flush_ref_samples function at /gpac/src/isomedia/movie_fragments.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
